title: Why couldn't Kanye West become the US President in 2020? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Who says he can’t? There is no law that says you must have political experience, be a senator, or a representative in order to be a President. There are three rules for a person to be eligible to become President: You must have been born in the United States.You must have been a resident in the United States for more than 14 years.You must be at least 35 years of age.Kanye is currently 43 years of age, was born in Atlanta, Georgia, and he has lived in the United States his entire life.

There are numerous reasons. The practical reason is he didn’t have the operation in place to launch a serious bid for the presidency. Also he does not have a realistic reason for people to vote for him. A controversial musical figure with a history of bipolar disorder is going to need an overriding narrative to give people confidence in their leadership skills. After Trump, it would have to be something more interesting than “I’m a businessman with a following.”
